page.title: 02A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: The first thing I do is get up at 8 o'clock. I get washed and brush my teeth.Then I go downstairs and into the kitchen.I brush my hair and have my breakfast.I have Weetabix for breakfast.After that I make sure all my school things are ready.I find my flute and my flute music.I look at my pet lambs,pick up my school bag and say goodbye to my dog.I climb into my dad's car and we go down to the white gate (it is a mile down the lane)and wait for Mr.Conning.He takes me to school in a bus.Victoria is the next person we pick up across the{A.1.}Next he picks up Gareth and Christine, Matthew and Sarah at Cowthorpe.Then we go up to school.I get my maths out and do that.Then I do some English.We have dinner at 12 o'clock.We sometimes have salad for dinner(salad is all vegetables grown in the ground).
